dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2969 IH: TANF Marriage Penalty Elimination Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Holding introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To eliminate the separate participation rate for 2-parent families receiving TANF assistance.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the TANF Marriage Penalty Elimination Act.

section.header: Modification of TANF participation rate requirements

subsection.header: Elimination of separate participation rate requirements for 2-Parent families
subsection.text: Section 407 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 607) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking all through A State the first place it appears and inserting the following:
in the subsection heading, by striking rates and inserting rate;
in paragraph (1)(A), by striking (a)(1) and inserting (a);
by striking paragraph (2) and redesignating paragraphs (3) through (5) as paragraphs (2) through (4), respectively;
in paragraph (3) (as so redesignated), by striking paragraphs (1)(B) and (2)(B) and inserting paragraph (1)(B); and
in paragraph (4) (as so redesignated), by striking rates and inserting rate; and

clause.text: by striking all through For purposes of subsection (b)(1)(B)(i) and inserting the following:
by striking paragraphs (1)(B)(i) and (2)(B) of subsection (b) and inserting subsection (b)(1)(B)(i); and
by striking in all families and in 2-parent families, respectively,.

paragraph.text: The paragraph heading for section 409(a)(3) of such Act (42 U.S.C. 609(a)(3)) is amended by striking rates and inserting rate.
Section 411(b)(1)(A) of such Act (42 U.S.C. 611(b)(1)(A)) is amended by striking rates and inserting rate.

section.text: The amendments made by this Act shall take effect on October 1, 2015.
